analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
saññojana ādi chaga ucchaka sani dassana ttika

original: Nosaññojanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: no saññojanam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no saññojanaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi pañhā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā
tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noganthaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: nogantham na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nooghaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: noogham na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca nooghaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noyogaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no yogam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no yogaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nonīvaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no nīvaraṇam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no nīvaraṇaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noparāmāsaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na uparāmāsam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na uparāmāsaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi
